name: Mercury10
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mercury board
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this skill to customize your automation projects with Mercury10 board, take your IoT dreams to the next level.

You will be able to connect to mercury10 board by following these simple steps:

1- Enable Mercury10 skill in your amazon account.
2- Go to mercury10.com and create your account with the same email address that is associated with your Amazon Alexa account.
3- Make any program using Mercury10-Alexa library, compile and upload using Mercury10 IDE
4- That's it, now you are connected and ready to start using your Mercury10 board, enjoy!

Select device by saying:

1- Alexa, list devices: this will list all the available devices in your mws account.
2- Alexa, select kitchen light.

Give a command by saying:

3-Alexa, set light on
4-Alexa, set light off
5-Alexa, get smoke detector status
